preference.displayNameDescription: This name will be displayed publicly.
preference.deadlinesDescription: Set your preferred deadlines for morning and evening tasks.
preference.morningDeadlineHint: e.g., 09:00 AM. Tasks due before this time are considered morning tasks.
preference.eveningDeadlineHint: e.g., 10:00 PM. Tasks due before this time are considered evening tasks.

about.title: About LOS
about.subtitle: Learn about the app's purpose and features.

whatIs.title: What is LOS?
whatIs.description: LOS is a Life Organization System designed to help you set clear goals, manage tasks, and track your progress toward a more meaningful life. Inspired by Landmark Education principles.

features.title: Key Features
features.feature1: Goal Setting: Define clear, actionable goals across different life areas.
features.feature2: Daily Tasks: Create and manage daily tasks aligned with your long-term goals.
features.feature3: Progress Tracking: Visualize your progress with insightful analytics and charts.
features.feature4: Daily Motivation: Get inspired with carefully curated quotes every day.

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.step1: Define Your Goals: Start by creating your goals in the Goals section.
howToUse.step2: Set Daily Tasks: Create tasks each day that move you closer to your goals.
howToUse.step3: Track Your Progress: Use the Progress tab to see how you're doing.
howToUse.step4: Stay Consistent: Make it a daily habit to use the app.
howToUse.step5: Reflect and Adjust: Regularly review your goals and adjust as needed.

quoteOfDay.title: Quote of the Day
quotes: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Stay hungry, stay foolish.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
The best way to predict the future is to create it.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Dream bigger. Do bigger.
Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Little things make big days.
It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
Small steps every day lead to big results.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
Commit to what happens rather than how it happens.
Commit to achieving predetermined results rather than clinging to routines.
Be willing to challenge any difficulty.
Be willing to shift mindset and correct actions.
Objective facts are the ultimate authority.
Be willing to let go.
Clear vision and goals, with focus on action plans.
Act with urgency rather than desperation.
Details, details, details and a complete plan.
You are rigorous, disciplined, and persevering.
Fervent desire, firm belief, effective action, iron will.
Life is a journey of inspiration and calling.
Enrolment: Through interaction, inspire others to see possibilities and take action.
CNA spirit purpose: Inspire calling, contribute to creating a workable world, achieve self, achieve others, achieve society.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Highest level of enrolment: Inspire others to enhance life value and take action.
CNA spirit purpose: Inspire people to commit, live out life positions, create extraordinary successful lives, pursue excellence, continuously improve, and move toward life vision.
